name: Elfin Paradise
overview: Elfin Paradise is an adventure dating simulation game in which the player controls a young art student (that maybe is human or not that will be seeing at the end of the game depending of the player choices) that goes to an art school when one day he meets 5 fairies that wants to help him with his art jobs inspiring him, but also they want to know more about the human world and is up to the art student to help them in that. During each week as in all dating simulation game, the player decided in which the character will spend his time on: he can go to different art classes, go around town in look for inspiration, talk to the fairies, going out with his friends or the fairies around the town, go shopping, skiing, etc. When he goes around with his friends or girls the player can choose between different answers that will make the student relations worse or better, and make it easier or more difficult to date them again. The game features japanese voice acting for the game characters and different endings depending of the player choices during the game.
